entry.source: This is Hope. We have a Gauntlet in our{F801}possession that we refer to as the Cursed{F801}Gauntlet, and a certain problem occurs when{F801}we attempt to summon with it. I would rather{F801}not let a valuable Gauntlet go to waste.{F801}Report to the Samurai in the treasure room.{F801}
